mapper.sql:
WHERE TRIM(pa.`city`) = TRIM(#{city}) AND TRIM(pa.`street`) = TRIM(#{street}) AND TRIM(pa.`building_num`) = TRIM(#{buildingNumber})
AND TRIM(pa.`building_corp`) = TRIM(#{buildingCorp})
AND TRIM(pa.`apartment`) = TRIM(#{apartment}) AND TRIM(pa.`first_name`) = TRIM(#{firstName}) AND TRIM(pa.`middle_name`) = TRIM(#{middleName}) AND TRIM(pa.`last_name`) = TRIM(#{lastName}) AND TRIM(pa.`own_num_sr`) = TRIM(#{ownNumSr})

where.if: AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM `organization_string_culture` osc WHERE osc.`value` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{oszn}, '%') AND osc.`id` IN (SELECT oa.`value_id` FROM `organization_attribute` oa WHERE oa.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND oa.`attribute_type_id` = 900 AND oa.`object_id` = pa.`oszn_id`) )

AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM `organization_string_culture` osc WHERE osc.`value` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{calculationCenter}, '%') AND osc.`id` IN (SELECT oa.`value_id` FROM `organization_attribute` oa WHERE oa.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND oa.`attribute_type_id` = 900 AND oa.`object_id` = pa.`calc_center_id`) )

mapper.select: SELECT pa.`id`, pa.`city`, pa.`street`, pa.`building_num` buildingNumber, pa.`building_corp` buildingCorp, pa.`apartment`, pa.`first_name` firstName, pa.`middle_name` middleName, pa.`last_name` lastName, pa.`own_num_sr` ownNumSr, pa.`account_number` accountNumber, pa.`oszn_id` osznId, pa.`calc_center_id` calculationCenterId FROM `person_account` pa WHERE pa.`id` = #{id}
